params.taskDescription:
If the ________, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p</annotation></semantics></math>, of a conditional statement is true, then the conclusion, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">q</annotation></semantics></math>, must also be true for the conditional statement <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p \to q</annotation></semantics></math> to be true.

params.taskDescription:
The biconditional statement <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">↔<!-- ↔ --></mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p \leftrightarrow q</annotation></semantics></math> is __________ whenever the truth value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p</annotation></semantics></math> matches the truth value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">q</annotation></semantics></math>, otherwise it is _________.

questionSetStimulus: Fill in the blanks to complete the following sentences.
